TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PackageRelationship extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示源 或 与可以为 或外部资源的目标对象之间的关联。

span.span: Represents an association between a source or , and a target object which can be a or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A定义之间的关联*源*或到*目标*或外部的资源。A defines an association between a *source* or to a *target* or external resource. 源对象被视为关系"所有者"。The source object is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 类具有没有公共构造函数; 相反，使用两种创建方法：The class has no public constructor; instead, two Create methods are used: ||| |-|-| |..|创建的"包级别"关系 — 从到指定的部分或外部的资源包。Creates a "package-level" relationship—from a package to a specified part or external resource.| |..|创建"部分级"关系 — 从一部分到另一个部件或外部的资源。Creates a "part-level" relationship—from one part to another part or external resource.| 由标识源的包或部件的关系属性。The source package or part is identified by the property of the relationship. 由标识目标部分或外部资源的关系属性。The target part or external resource is identified by the property of the relationship. 创建或删除的关系不会影响以任何方式的源或目标对象。Creating or deleting a relationship does not affect the source or target objects in any way. 如果删除源对象，则也将删除对象拥有的所有关系。If a source object is deleted, all relationships owned by the object are also deleted. 关系可以在文档和文档之间的导航。Relationships enable navigation both in a document and between documents. 关系还支持文档对象模型服务，例如链接到特定文档元素在打印时。Relationships also support document object model services, such as linking a to specific document elements when printing. 有关详细信息元素请参阅中的部分 1.3"关系"*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about elements see Section 1.3 "Relationships" in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: public string Id { get; }
.property instance string Id
Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取标识关系的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that identifies the relationship.
A string that identifies the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性字符串是唯一的所有关系归包或部分。The property string is unique for all relationships owned by the package or part. 调用中指定**包**。The is specified in the call to the **Package**. 或**PackagePart**。or **PackagePart**. 创建关系的方法。method that created the relationship. 创建关系后，不能更改。After the relationship is created, the cannot be changed. 属性字符串是有效的 XML 标识符。The property string is a valid XML identifier. 类型是 xsd:ID 并且必须遵循中规定的命名约定*XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型*规范 (请参阅[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.Package Package { get; }
.property instance class System.IO.Packaging.Package Package
Public ReadOnly Property Package As Package
public: property System::IO::Packaging::Package ^ Package { System::IO::Packaging::Package ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the that contains this relationship.
The package that contains this relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息元素请参阅*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about elements see the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: public string RelationshipType { get; }
.property instance string RelationshipType
Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipType As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取关系的限定类型名称。

span.span: Gets the qualified type name of the relationship.
The qualified type name of the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用中指定**包**。The is specified in the call to the **Package**. 或**PackagePart**。or **PackagePart**. 创建关系的方法。method that created the relationship. 创建关系后，不能更改。After the relationship is created, the cannot be changed. 在 URI 类似的语法中定义并标识的关系的角色。 is defined in a URI-like syntax and identifies the role of the relationship. 例如，"http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource"标识与目标属于"所需的资源。"之间的关系For example, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifies the relationship to a target part that is a "required-resource." **包级关系类型****Package-Wide Relationship Types** |描述Description|关系类型Relationship Type| |-----------------|-----------------------| |核心属性Core Properties|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/core-properties| |数字签名Digital Signature|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/signature| |数字签名证书Digital Signature Certificate|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/certificate| |数字签名来源Digital Signature Origin|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/origin| |缩略图Thumbnail|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/thumbnail| 有关包关系的详细信息类型请参阅第 3 章和附录 I*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationship types see Chapter 3 and Appendix I of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

.property instance class System.Uri SourceUri

public: property Uri ^ SourceUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取拥有关系的包或部分的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package or part that owns the relationship.

value.span: 拥有关系的 或 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the or that owns the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关系归，返回的 URI"/"。If the relationship is owned by a , returns a URI of "/". 如果关系归，返回的 URI 的一部分。If the relationship is owned by a , returns the URI of the part.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode TargetMode { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode TargetMode
Public ReadOnly Property TargetMode As TargetMode
public: property System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode TargetMode { System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示关系的目标是否是到 的 或 。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the target of the relationship is or to the .

value.span: 指示 是否引用到 的资源 或 的枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates whether references a resource or to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用中指定**包**。The is specified in the call to the **Package**. 或**PackagePart**。or **PackagePart**. 创建关系的方法。method that created the relationship. 创建关系后不能更改。After the relationship is created the cannot be changed. 当是、必须是相对的引用。When is , the MUST be a relative reference. 对于包级别的关系的相对引用解析相对于拥有和包含关系的源包的包 URI。For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship. (示例源包包 URI:"pack://http:、 www.adatum.com、 files,datapak.package/"。)对于部分级的关系，处于已解决状态相对于拥有关系的源部分 (解释相对于)。(Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship ( is interpreted relative to ). 当是、可以是相对的引用或完全限定的 URI。When is , the can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI. 如果是相对的引用，引用将解释位置相对，其中包含此关系。If the is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the that contains this relationship. 有关详细信息参阅 1.3.3"关系标记"的*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

.property instance class System.Uri TargetUri
Public ReadOnly Property TargetUri As Uri
public: property Uri ^ TargetUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取关系的目标资源的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource of the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用中指定**包**。The is specified in the call to the **Package**. 或**PackagePart**。or **PackagePart**. 创建关系的方法。method that created the relationship. 创建关系后不能更改。After the relationship is created the cannot be changed. 当是、必须是相对的引用。When is , the MUST be a relative reference. 对于包级别的关系的相对引用解析相对于拥有和包含关系的源包的包 URI。For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship. (示例源包包 URI:"pack://http:、 www.adatum.com、 files,datapak.package/"。)对于部分级的关系，处于已解决状态相对于拥有关系的源部分 (解释相对于)。(Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship ( is interpreted relative to ). 当是、可以是相对的引用或完全限定的 URI。When is , the can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI. 如果是相对的引用，引用将解释位置相对，其中包含此关系。If the is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the that contains this relationship. 有关详细信息参阅 1.3.3"关系标记"的*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
